Text: This episode is retarded. Skip it if you want to save 40 minutes of your life.

Can you "skip" on water for a few seconds if you're going very very fast? YES.

Can you make a basic parachute from a shitload of shower curtains? YES.

What happened to the show where Adam and Jamie just spent the episode building something cool and interesting in their shop?
@PLEIGHER Precisely. JOLENE can go further than that. No myths here, just junk filler.
@killher: It can't possibly be as bad as the Deadliest Catch special. That episode pissed me off.
